summary: Scientist becomes obsessed with the idea of communicating with his dead wife.
cast: Boris Karloff|Richard Fiske|Amanda Duff|Anne Revere|Cy Schindell|Dorothy Adams|Walter Baldwin|Kenneth MacDonald|Shirley Warde|Ernie Adams|Lester Allen|Wheaton Chambers|Earl Crawford|Harrison Greene|Erwin Kalser|Eddie Kane|George McKay|Al Rhein|John Tyrrell|Jacques Vanaire
title: Más allá de la tumba
